thread.title: Explore the Magical World of Fungi at Corinna Wilderness Village, Tasmania
thread.title_full: Explore the Magical World of Fungi at Corinna Wilderness Village, Tasmania

author: API User
title: Explore the Magical World of Fungi at Corinna Wilderness Village, Tasmania
text:
Corinna, Tasmania – March 2025 – Corinna Wilderness Lodge, located in the pristine Tarkine rainforest, is offering two exclusive "Fungus Lovers" packages this June for nature enthusiasts and photography lovers. Set against the stunning backdrop of Tasmania’s untouched wilderness, guests can embark on a fascinating journey into the world of fungi, guided by expert mycologist Alison Pouliot and renowned photographer Luke O’Brien.
These eco-friendly retreats allow visitors to discover the region's rich fungal diversity, featuring species that can only be found in this remote corner of the world. The packages, designed to cater to both budding and experienced nature lovers, include guided fungi walks, photography workshops, and an immersive experience in the heart of the Tarkine rainforest.
Fungus Photography with Luke O’Brien – June 2025
From May 31 to June 3, 2025, the “Fungus Photography” package offers a three-night stay at Corinna Wilderness Village, where participants will join talented Tasmanian photographer Luke O’Brien. Renowned for his captivating images of Tasmania’s fungi, O’Brien will teach guests how to capture the essence of these mysterious organisms. Over the course of three days, attendees will learn practical tips on camera settings, composition, and focus techniques while exploring the many trails surrounding Corinna during the peak of fungi season. There will also be an opportunity to edit and refine photographs in a group post-processing session.
Discover Fungi with Alison Pouliot – June 2025
From June 3 to June 6, 2025, the “Discover Fungi with an Expert Mycologist” package invites guests to explore the wonders of the fungal kingdom with renowned mycologist Alison Pouliot. Pouliot, an expert in the ecology and cultural significance of fungi, will guide participants on interactive walks through the Tarkine Rainforest, offering insights into the crucial ecological role fungi play in this vibrant ecosystem. Attendees will uncover the fascinating biology, cultural connections, and environmental importance of fungi in hands-on seminars and rainforest forays.
Package Details & Pricing
Accommodation for both events is in Corinna’s cozy, eco-friendly cabins. The Fungi Lovers 3-Night Stay package prices are as follows:
- Queen Cottage (1 Person): $1149
- Queen Cottage (2 Persons): $1371
- Family Cottage (2 Persons): $1554
- Family Cottage (3 Persons): $1776
- Family Cottage (4 Persons): $1998
Note: Additional costs may apply for optional activities like kayaking or scenic cruises during your stay.
Booking and Enquiries
Spaces are limited for these exclusive packages, so early booking is recommended. For more information or to book, please contact reservations@corinna.com.au or visit www.corinna.com.au.
About Corinna Wilderness Lodge
Corinna Wilderness Lodge is an eco-conscious retreat located in the heart of Tasmania’s Tarkine rainforest. With its commitment to sustainability and environmental preservation, Corinna offers a unique blend of adventure, education, and relaxation in one of Australia’s most biodiverse regions. Guests can enjoy a range of activities from guided hikes to kayaking and cruises, all within a pristine wilderness setting.
For press inquiries, please contact:
Reservations: reservations@corinna.com.au
Website: www.corinna.com.au
This exciting opportunity promises to be a once-in-a-lifetime experience for all those passionate about fungi and the natural world.
